metadata.title: CVE-2020-11076 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In Puma (RubyGem) before 4.3.4 and 3.12.5, an attacker could smuggle anHTTP response, by using an invalid transfer-encoding header. The problemhas been fixed in Puma 3.12.5 and Puma 4.3.4.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11076` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

puma - 5.6.5-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: puma package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.6.5-3ubuntu1').
